title: The Ultimate Confidence Coaching Masterclass
description:
Are you ready to learn the essential truths and principles for building authentic confidence that lasts?


If so, this course that will take you on an in-depth journey of self discovery to understand the reasons for low self-esteem, how to overcome it, and how to implement your newfound confidence throughout every area of your life Ã¢â‚¬â€œ genuine confidence that lasts.


Upon enrolling in this Confidence Masterclass, you will:


Learn to recognise, understand and manage your negative emotions.

Learn effective strategies for reprogramming your minds negative and damaging self-talk.

Gain life changing insights into who you truly are.

Identify self-sabotaging attitudes and behaviours, fast and effectively, and how to eliminate them.

Understand how the quality of your thinking has an influence over your emotional state.

Understand where fear and insecurity begins and how to overcome it.

Low self-esteem can make life unnecessarily difficult, both at work and at home, so developing genuine self-esteem and authentic confidence in who you are is essential for your happiness and general wellbeing in life.


Some people miss out on the many great experiences that average people enjoy, due to fear or a lack of confidence. This course will introduce you to the idea that we aren't born with any pre-existing confidence of self-esteem issues, and that low self-esteem is often a result of mistaken perceptions that we make ourselves in childhood and growing up.


Building upon the disciplines of modern psychology, philosophy, NLP and counselling theory, this unique course reaches far beyond many of today's standard self-help programs; addressing the core issues that underpin many confidence & low-self esteem problems that people experience. Together, we'll take an in-depth look at the causes of low-self esteem and explore techniques that will allow you to push negative thoughts aside and build authentic confidence in its place.


The insightful stories and exercises also allow you to build your understanding on the key factors that can trigger personal lapses in confidence, as well as teach you how to recognise the thought patterns that produce and maintain low self-esteem and other negative emotions. Once you learn how to recognise these, you can quickly nip them in the bud.


The uniquely crafted course is Partnered with 100% money back guarantee and provides an actionable guide for those who are committed to creating positive changes in their most important life areas.


What are the requirements?


Students who are considering taking this course would ideally have made a commitment to personal growth and development.

Internet Access

An open mind to learn

A passion for personal development

This course is not to be used as an alternative to appropriate medical, psychological or medical support.


What am I going to get from this course?


Over 42 lectures and 8 hours of content!

Enjoy being authentic in all social situations.

Learn how to understand and manage your negative emotions.

Face new challenges with far greater comfort.

Realize how confidence is a direct result of learning to know yourself.

Learn how to begin building authentic confidence which lasts.

Understand how our actions and behaviours determine our lifeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s outcomes.

Learn a strategy for reprogramming your minds negative self-talk.

Recognise how your self-worth will determine your overall self-esteem.

Learn how to identify self-sabotaging attitudes and behaviours, fast and effectively.

Understand how the quality of your thinking influences your emotional state.

Have enough self belief to put across view and ideas to other people.

What is the target audience?

Take this course if you frequently suffer with low confidence and self esteem.

Holistic coaches, counsellors, life coaches and mental health specialists will benefit from this course.

Ideal for parents, carers and support workers who want to help others to grow in confidence.

This course compliments the ongoing studies of all those who are committed to self improvement.

This course will benefit students and young people who are uncertain of their future
